title: synopsiscapital
author: synopsiscapital
content: I'm on the lookout for wallets on the ethereum chain that have bigger transactions on them, OR older wallets dating from 2016-2019Offering $350 per wallet. Leave a reply if you can help me with that and i'll send you a dm :-)

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: What are you looking for? I have a wallet from 2018 that's empty now, and has only worthless tokens. Is that what you're looking for?

comments.author: ChangeBTC
comments.body: I have an ETH wallet with a few thousand $ in transactions. Balance is a few cents today. LMK.

comments.author: maeanne16
comments.body: I have an available wallet created year 2017-2018 and have many transactions. Kindly please DM.

comments.author: xCryptoManiaX
comments.body: I've got a couple of wallets from 2017-2018 with a considerable amount transferred. If you'd like to know more, please message me.

comments.author: StormHawk
comments.body: Wow, is this even real? What are you buying an empty wallet for if I may ask? I have been contacted of telegram for empty wallet before and I failed to reply the person because I don't trust anyone that PM me first, he wanted to pay 20$ per wallet but in your own case it is too much.

comments.author: dravenbtc
comments.body: I also have about 2 wallets, now not used but few years ago did many transactions, in first is like 2$ and in second like 5$.

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: I think @OP is either a scammer or he's looking to claim an airdrop that the token can be worth higher than $350, I always feel suspicious when someone want to buy someone wallet when there's no difference between old and new wallet. Since the @OP is inactive after a day he created this thread, it seems he already successfully someone ETH wallet which have been contacted him.

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: Apocollapse on March 30, 2023, 08:51:31 AMI think @OP is either a scammer or he's looking to claim an airdrop that the token can be worth higher than $350, I always feel suspicious when someone want to buy someone wallet when there's no difference between old and new wallet.Or both I read about an airdrop that pays around $2000, but only to wallets that used some shitcoin back in the days.

comments.author: arwin100
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceV on March 30, 2023, 09:54:51 AMQuote from: Apocollapse on March 30, 2023, 08:51:31 AMI think @OP is either a scammer or he's looking to claim an airdrop that the token can be worth higher than $350, I always feel suspicious when someone want to buy someone wallet when there's no difference between old and new wallet.Or both I read about an airdrop that pays around $2000, but only to wallets that used some shitcoin back in the days.He never mention to use escrow so most provably he is just collecting those addresses which have thousands of dollars in transaction to use it for claiming on upcoming airdrops. This airdrops has been famous again since there are so many people who participate earning some good cash so maybe this is caught his interest to bait people about paying false $350 each wallet.If he stated about using an escrow on this transaction maybe we people cannot call him a possible a scammer.

comments.author: synopsiscapital
comments.created_time: April 19, 2023, 07:31:52 PMLast edit: April 19, 2023, 07:57:33 PM by synopsiscapital
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceV on March 30, 2023, 09:54:51 AMQuote from: Apocollapse on March 30, 2023, 08:51:31 AMI think @OP is either a scammer or he's looking to claim an airdrop that the token can be worth higher than $350, I always feel suspicious when someone want to buy someone wallet when there's no difference between old and new wallet.Or both I read about an airdrop that pays around $2000, but only to wallets that used some shitcoin back in the days.Not a scammer haha. Forgot i posted here so forgot to log in. Have bought from a couple others before where we used a middleman and escrow.

comments.author: synopsiscapital
comments.body: Quote from: xCryptoManiaX on March 23, 2023, 03:29:18 PMI've got a couple of wallets from 2017-2018 with a considerable amount transferred. If you'd like to know more, please message me.My account is fairly new so I cant message you. You can reach me on telegram and we can talk there, i'm interested  @packetsorpizza.
